plot: Ada is frightened and alone in her villa in Kamieniec, Poland, in 1945. A man comes to her door, claiming to be an art collector and wanting to stay the night. She tells him he should leave...
title: Wkrótce nadejda bracia
plot_es: Ada is frightened and alone in her villa in Kamieniec, Poland, in 1945. A man comes to her door, claiming to be an art collector and wanting to stay the night. She tells him he should leave...
plot_en: Ada is frightened and alone in her villa in Kamieniec, Poland, in 1945. A man comes to her door, claiming to be an art collector and wanting to stay the night. She tells him he should leave...

cast.role: Man Giving the Photo to the Captain
cast.name: Wlodzimierz Adamski
